prompts: Create a cute fairy-type Pokemon with round features and large expressive eyes.
I want to design a tiny Pokemon that has a soft pink color and a joyful demeanor.
Generate an adorable Normal-type creature with a puffy body and a cheerful personality.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that has a chubby shape and is often found in grassy areas.
Imagine a small, round Pokemon with a bubbly appearance and a playful vibe.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a plush toy, with big eyes and a friendly smile.
Design a fluffy creature that embodies joy and can be encountered in urban environments.
